body_html:
Thanks @guillaumekln for pointing that out, with the latest tf-nightly I can confirm that this problem is gone! I can happily train and evaluate forever now.

@robieta the input_fn was indeed called repeatedly for every train and evaluate cycle. With the new behavior, the input_fn is only called once for all train cycles, and repeatedly for the evaluate cycles.

Closing as this seems to be solved by 3edb609.
